page.title: 10Leisure and Recreation, Hoo
page.content: There are many types of leisure and recreational activities,for example, there is athletics, tennis, table tennis, squash, football and swimming. { At the marina}one can sail, scull, row or canoe. There are also many{less {energetic sports}like golf, pitch and putt or cycling.At{Deangate Ridge} there is an 18 hole golf course, pitch and putt, 3 tennis courts and a cinder running track with synthetic run ups. It is a full size track with all the field facilities including a pavilion. The schools have 3 cricket pitches, several rugby/football pitches,as well as table tennis tables, tennis courts, a grass track, crash mats, a high jump 'D', long jump/triple jump pits, badmington courts, indoor gym equipment and netball and hockey facilities.
